name: Story of a Line
description:
(S.O.A.L.)

<study on algorithmic linemaking>

A visual lullaby following the life of a whimsical line through four acts of calming visual/audio landscapes. It is an animated experience of 40 minutes so sit back, relax and enjoy. It uses a procedural random seed to create a unique path for the line so that everytime it is played you will have a different experience. Perfect for relaxing and reflecting after a busy day at work.

Once there was a Line,
sometimes wide, sometimes thin, sometimes striped but mostly plain,
not far in its tread from the bed, this line witnessed an unfamiliar bend,
for lo and behold; there were other lines!
some thin and short,
others squat and ellongated,
some traced curves, others spirals,
color clad or simple tailored
ziz-zagging here and there in a sprawl,
our Line wasn't sure quite what but to do,
so off it went with much ado,
to who knows where to.
This is the story of a line.

Input:
'ESC' key to access the menu (control audio levels, quit)
